comment: Hello! I just started using my GAB account, and so far, I love it. I'm a retired Army combat Veteran, married to an Active Duty Army infantryman, a mom to great dogs and cats, & a proud Republican. I support the police & all other emergency services, & last but certainly not least, I proudly & gladly support our President. I hope to converse with you soon!
amr:
# ::snt Hello! I just started using my GAB account, and so far, I love it. I'm a retired Army combat Veteran, married to an Active Duty Army infantryman, a mom to great dogs and cats, & a proud Republican. I support the police & all other emergency services, & last but certainly not least, I proudly & gladly support our President. I hope to converse with you soon!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hello
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / start-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (a2 / account
                              :mod (p / publication
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "GAB"))
                              :poss ii))
                  :time (j / just))
            :op2 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 u
                  :mod (s2 / so-far)))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (v / veteran
                  :mod (c / combat-01)
                  :mod (m2 / military
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Army"))
                  :ARG0-of (r / retire-01))
            :op2 (m3 / marry-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (m4 / military
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Army"))
                              :ARG2 (ii2 / infantryman
                                    :ARG0-of (a4 / activity-06
                                          :ARG1 (d / duty))))))
            :op3 (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ARG2 (m5 / mom)))
                  :ARG2 (d2 / dog
                        :mod (g / great))
                  :ARG3 (c2 / cat
                        :mod g))
            :op4 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (p5 / pride-01)
                  :ARG0-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p6 / political-party
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Republican"
                                    :op2 "Party")))))
      :snt4 (a5 / and
            :op1 (s3 / support-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a6 / and
                        :op1 (p7 / police)
                        :op2 (s4 / service
                              :mod (e / emergency)
                              :mod (o / other)
                              :mod (a7 / all))))
            :op2 (s5 / support-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (p8 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (w / we)
                              :ARG2 (p9 / president)))))
      :mod (c3 / certain)
      :ARG1-of (h7 / have-concession-91
            :ARG2 -)
      :ARG3 (l2 / least))

# ::snt Just immature ordinary racism.
(r / racism
      :mod (o / ordinary)
      :mod (j / just)
      :ARG1-of (m / mature-02
            :polarity -))

comment: Offensive language based on race is not allowed. Please refrain from using such language in the future.
amr:
# ::snt Offensive language based on race is not allowed. Please refrain from using such language in the future.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / allow-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :ARG1-of (o / offend-01)
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                        :ARG2 (r / race))))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (l2 / language
                        :mod (s / such))
                  :time (f / future))))

comment: Finally someone else who respects our President. It doesn't matter if you agree with him, he's still our leader!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / respect-01
            :ARG0 (s / someone
                  :mod (e / else))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (w / we)
                        :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
            :mod (f / final))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / matter-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (a / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 p))
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02

                  :mod (s2 / still)
